summary: The module defines unit tests that compare PyTorch‑based RNNT loss implementations (including multiblank and TDT variants) against a NumPy reference, using both fixed and randomly generated activation label configurations to verify numerical correctness across devices and data types.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the accuracy of speech‑recognition loss functions in the NeMo toolkit, preventing regressions and ensuring that optimized Numba‑accelerated versions produce reliable training signals.
